page.title: 16A FARMERS DAY.STOCK/CROPS.
page.content: Mr.Jackson gets up at 6.30am and feeds the animals.Then he has his breakfast and then goes back to his farm and does the rest of the work.He has to tell the men what to do.Then he gives the cows their breakfast food and drives the tractor around the field. When he comes back from the field he does some more work on the farm.If the food runs out he would have to go and buy some more food for the animals.Then he would have to drive the tractor into the garage and then have a talk with the men they could be having problems mending the tractor.Mr.Jackson said the jobs have got to be finished. --------------------------------------- CROPS:OIL SEED RAPE.BARLEY.WHEAT. SUGAR BEET . ANIMALS.CATTLE BEEF AND DAIRY.CHICKENS. SHEEP.GOATS
